title: Marvel Zombies 4 (Trade Paperback)
description:
When you have a pair of escaped, flesh-eating monsters on the loose, who do you send after them? More monsters, of course! Assembled by A.R.M.O.R. (Alternate Reality Monitoring and Operational Rescue), the all-new, all-horrific Midnight Sons are tasked with hunting down a pair of escaped zombies that carry an infection capable of wiping out not only the planet Earth, but the entire universe! Yes, it’s up to Morbius, the Living Vampire; Werewolf by Night; the witch Jennifer Kale; and the Son of Satan himself, Daimon Hellstrom, to hunt down and neutralize the rapidly spreading infection carried by the classic Zombie, Simon Garth, and the severed yet still talking head of Deadpool! Collecting MARVEL ZOMBIES 4 #1-4.
Parental Advisory …$16.99
ISBN: 978-0-7851-3918-8
